description:
Additional Resources that helps / supports integration
            testing on a kubernetes operator written with the KubeOps
            operator sdk.
releaseNotes:
# [6.0.0](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/compare/v5.4.9...v6.0.0) (2021-10-11)


### Bug Fixes

* **Dockerfile:** Allow non-priviledged docker. ([#294](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/294)) ([da83792](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/da83792fe037f1064fe53cfb7be3ca9557334fe8)), closes [#289](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/289)


### Features

* Combine resource events created,updated,notmodified. ([#293](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/293)) ([7789296](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/778929627f689ba27cabeab8d89cf0d78ab2c88b)), closes [#292](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/292)
* **CRDs:** Allow ShortNames to be configured. ([#297](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/297)) ([766bc55](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/766bc55ae2d303ce49ebfbae38288c5e695c8354)), closes [#271](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/271)
* **Error Retry:** Allow configurable backoff and count. ([#296](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/296)) ([9254bb1](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/9254bb16bb70306752b39c9a57bfd9d585d8f18b)), closes [#276](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/276)
* **Webhooks:** Make StatusCode/StatusMessage public. ([#295](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/295)) ([2bd5166](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/commit/2bd5166ab3463a86d91743bacf37ed134b2af3a4)), closes [#288](https://github.com/buehler/dotnet-operator-sdk/issues/288)


### BREAKING CHANGES

* This removes the separat methods
for created, updated, and not modified events.
Those events are combined into one event reconcile.
According to https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Control_loop,
this is considered good practice. To migrate, remove
all references to the mentioned events and replace
them with one call to reconcileasync.
